website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice if you're looking for a spacious hanging chair that works indoors or outdoors.
pros: One of the easiest hanging chairs to assemble, only taking roughly 20 minutes
The sitting area is quite long, so tall people have room to fit
Included cushions were thick and comfortable – a nice touch

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just set up the egg chair to put inside my house. It is larger than I expected and quite comfortable. The egg is supported by metal bars with rattan/fake wood weavings, which is a relief since I wasn't sure how sturdy the chair would be. I'm 5'5" and 130lbs, I feel like I could tuck my legs in and still be comfortable. The chain can rotate pretty much 360 degrees although the back pole will block you if you swing all the way around. The chair came in two boxes, one for the swing and one for the chair. It was very easy to set up, took my brother and I maybe 15 minutes total.
customer_reviews.author: KingV

customer_reviews.title: Only 5 metal strips where you supposed to seat
customer_reviews.text: Only 5 metal strips where you supposed to seat, so the cuisine is dropping through the frame, and after a few minutes of seating you start feeling that you are sitting on a metal stripe. Sadly after putting it all together i returned it because you just can't seat on it. Other than that it looks good..
customer_reviews.author: Shahar A.

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these and I love them! I just hung them from an outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I love them! I just hung them from an outdoor ceiling and then sold the bases for $75 each, making the chair super economical! I purchased really fat 1.5 inch rope from amazon to hang it which looks great. Unlike some of these chairs, it is tall enough for my 6'3 husband to sit in without bumping his head. I also ordered a swivel drink holder and added it so I am super thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mac

customer_reviews.title: The Wicker part of the chair came all broken and frayed!
customer_reviews.text: I put it together myself and it wasn't very difficult and the base went up easily and fast however when I got to the chair pieces of wicker were sticking out all over and some sections were very loose. I'd been wanting one of these for so long that after my "do it yourself" repairs it's not as pretty as I would've liked and would have been way too much of a hassle to take all apart and send back. I'm extremely disappointed in the quality of the chair itself
customer_reviews.author: Marnyek

customer_reviews.title: Best value, includes pads and stands too
customer_reviews.text: *update* I’ve had my 2 chairs outdoors for over 6 months now and haven’t had any issues (lots of kids always playing on them too). No trouble with the wicker unraveling as mentioned by others. Cushions clean easily. I regularly coat my chairs top to bottom with Scotchguard and we haven’t had any weather issues such as fading or rust** I hired someone to assemble these ( I bought 2) but these were the best priced I could find while still maintaining the swanky egg drop chair look (the cheaper ones look more like tents). They’re roomy, sexy, sturdy, and made my patio have a whole new vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Yay
customer_reviews.text: Very excited about this. Came way quicker than expected (but in two different packages in two different days so don’t freak out if that happens). Easy assembly. Yay!!!
customer_reviews.author: LR8ER

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A little piece of heaven. It’s definitely my new favorite for my patio. It’s so comfortable and well made. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Girleanu

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my back porch, and love it. It's used almost daily by someone. I have it hanging from the roof. I haven't put the stand together yet, but the swing is very sturdy and comfortable. My only suggestion is velcro to keep the cushions in place.
customer_reviews.author: phutch

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in two boxes one day apart. 1st I received the basket and the 2nd day I received the base. There were no parts in the first box to set up the basket. My husband and I tripled check the box to make sure we removed all parts before placing in the garage to be discarded on garbage day. As a matter of fact the box is still in our garage. We checked again a fourth time. We assumed the parts will arrive in the second box. They didn’t. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Treuherz

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the chair a week, but I'm pleased so far. It's been comfortable for my 5'5", 145lb frame - I've even managed to curl up in it. I put it together myself while binge watching a show. It would have been faster if I'd used a mini-ratchet set, but the tools provided worked, if slowly. Fingers crossed this holds up as it was in my budget. The closeup photos are to show coloring.
customer_reviews.author: CrewJulie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The base had a large dent and I was unable to assemble the product. I contacted the seller and the manufacturer for a replacement part and neither one was helpful. I was told I would need to send back the product in its entirety for a replacement. This is horrific customer service and I would urge anyone looking at this product to not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Tavores

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is like my little get away from life. Like seriously. When I'm stressed or have had a long day, I grab a book and sit in this chair and the world around me fades out. While it was a painstaking task to assemble, if the instructions are followed, it honestly isn't too terrible. I assembled it on my own. Once I assembled it, I put the cushions in and honestly I'm not sure I could have been any happier with the result. It is VERY sturdy and durable and most of all, it's extremely comfortable. I would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: TammiGayle

customer_reviews.title: The product is incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The product is not complete, i dont have the tools and half of it is missing. Should i send it back as it is?
customer_reviews.author: Poline Mirithu

customer_reviews.title: It needs better cushions.
customer_reviews.text: I’m super bummed out that the bottom cushion is already torn at the seam. I attempted to return the swing but after going on family vacation the return window has closed. The swing itself is great, but the cushions are not durable at all. It’s been sat on 5 times waiting for the enclosed porch to be finished so it can go outside. I’m hoping I can find a replacement otherwise it’s $200 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wanosik

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seating makes you sit too far forward. Almost a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberpunk

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair, classic 70s design. Strap broke already after three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This was rough on the hands to put together. It's also unwieldy to move the two boxes it arrived in through my yard to my patio. Guests vie for the chair when they come over because everyone loves curling up in it. It's really a cute chair and is often a topic of conversation with my friends. Unfortunately, three weeks after it was assembled a strap broke and is already dangling under the chair. 🙄 Can anything last a decent time nowadays?
customer_reviews.author: Shauna S

customer_reviews.title: Parts and screws are very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Swing stand box came with a lot of screws missing. U connector that attaches seat chain to the stand, was broken, pin did not have any threads on it to screw in the other part. Very cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: AlexP

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every person who has come to my apartment has fought over sitting in this chair! It's so comfy and I love to sit and read in it. It kinda feels like your floating after a while....you could almost fall asleep in it. It is easy to assemble, but kind of heavy. Would recommend at least 2 people to put it together to hold it in place while the other puts it screws parts together
customer_reviews.author: Zahwa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and cushions are horrible quality I have this chair for a year only and it’s falling apart, the lace around the chair they grip with clips it was only one week in my house and I notice damages , the chair it’s not comfortable after couple minutes sitting metals start to hurt you really bad !!!
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I loved it!! Really! Its my favorite place to sit after a busy day at work!! Reasonable price and durable material, I didn’t like the cushion so I bought it separately
customer_reviews.author: Tata

customer_reviews.title: ... a swing for my patio and this one is perfect as I'm renting and cannot hang a
customer_reviews.text: I needed a swing for my patio and this one is perfect as I'm renting and cannot hang a swing
customer_reviews.author: Skx

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing. It is well built, easy to put together, and we are getting so much enjoyment from it. Especially when entertaining. AND the price was the best anywhere in stores and on the Internet!
customer_reviews.author: LGIO

customer_reviews.title: Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very very deceptive. I paid the full amount for the chair and the hanger and never received the hanger. In the description it lists the dimensions of both the hanger and the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Newman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The string came off the chair already while I was trying to put it together
customer_reviews.author: nhu nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The chair is fun but the workmanship is lousy. Be prepared to redrill the metal holes that don't line up correctly. Have a rubber mallet handy for when things don't fit or line up correctly. Directions are very poor & unclear.
customer_reviews.author: CJasper

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Stay far away from this chair. I've had ot for 4 months and its already falling apart. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, well made hanging chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 23 year old son for his room. He has it parked in front of his desk and computer for school work, video games, etc. He just loves it. He says it is very comfortable, was easy to assemble, and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. Wayyyyy cheaper than Pier One. & cuter.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is sooooo great. The only thing I really "dislike" about it, is the way that it is put together. I'm just glad that I'm using mine indoors, fingers crossed for a greater longevity!
customer_reviews.author: ajduvall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this chair! It was easy to assemble and looks beautiful on my deck. I took off a star because some of the rattan wrap was loose at the bottom (seat) area will have to be reinforced soon but I feel sure I can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: missylissac

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When the product cam in, my wife was astonished on how sturdy it was and how quickly we put it together. And the price compared to some of the other ones out there can't be beat. She sits in it every night with her glass (unfortunately it does not come with a cup / wine glass holder) :) Very relaxing. She added a couple of other throw pillows for added comfort. Great chair and stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas. She loves it but it was missing a bolt. Other than that it's quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Rice

customer_reviews.title: The frame is sturdy and really is stable and holds a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is made of a plastic material. The frame is sturdy and really is stable and holds a lot of weight. It is so comfortable and has a lot of room to sit. I love the chair. It looks great, sturdy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Really great addition to our patio
customer_reviews.text: This egg chair is a really great addition to our patio. My husband assembled it himself without too much trouble. My son has spent hours reading and swinging in this. It’s sturdy and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy cocoon
customer_reviews.text: Great looking swing chair. Searched high and low for a swing chair until I found this one. Love the whimsical woven design and the price. Beautiful rich brown color with wide base makes it sturdy. Great value that includes chair, cushions and frame. Cushions do make it warm in hot weather and I plan to replace them in the future with better quality fabric. I hope the weave holds up as it is a loose weave. Highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our 11 year old son completely put this together!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous about the complexity of putting these types of things together. It was very well packaged, labeled and the instructions were so straight forward that our 11 year old put the entire thing together. I would highly recommend this product and I'm definitely going to purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Adams

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stunning
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It's comfortable and looks stunning. For the most part it was easy enough to assemble, but I'm a 62 year old woman and I needed my son's help to tighten up the screws and to hang the chair at the end. I would completely recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Konrad

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than we thought but it's perfect for her room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saved her money for almost a year to buy this and she LOVES it! It's bigger than we thought but it's perfect for her room. She's very excited to finally have it. It took about 15 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together if you are mechanically inclined. Stand is a little tippy but very comfortable. Pillows are excellent. I would recommend hanging from a tree.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My go to place to just relax!! However if you are sitting there for more than 1 hr, back starts hurting, probably because of the curve/eggshell design. Regardless, a very nice piece to own and keep!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks..not very comfy while pregnant. Dont let your children lay/sit in it sideways... Mine broke a strap with their foot -_- by pushing too hard.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Cushion too thin, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to assemble, and the cushion is too thin, not comfortable at all, I could feel the metal underneath. I need to buy a new cushion myself
customer_reviews.author: Joey Ruan

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 9th birthday. She and my wife absolutely love this chair. I threw a birthday party with 10 plus kids including their parents with everyone took turns sitting in the chair. This thing is super comfortable and very durable. I highly recommend this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Metal frame broke off from the top after a few time sitting in the chair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swing.
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 45 mins to assemble. Durable wicker swing. Sturdy metal base. Comfortable cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Sugra

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy! A great buy! It was bigger than I expected but it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mirtha Malave

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy stand. Comfy. Now we are thinking of getting a second one. Everyone wants to go relax on the deck in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlueGrassCat

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It is so comfortable I brought it in the house and it is now the only chair I use. The shipping was fast, the chair was easy to put together, the materials used are nice and sturdy, all that and comfort too.
customer_reviews.author: foreverfan

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! I've had it a few weeks and I seem to spend a lot of time sitting on the lanai in it. So relaxing! Seems to be well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rich

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this chair. They fight over whose turn it is to sit in it. It's comfortable and looks so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Very good material
customer_reviews.text: I have no backyard so I put this chair in my bedroom.so easy to install and heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Islam

customer_reviews.title: This is surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this would only last a few months and then fall apart. However it is really good quality and bigger than I thought it would be. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fahrenkrug

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Cheapest I found after a lot of research
customer_reviews.text: Good profuct. Safely delivered and looks like a good quality so far. Great seating and cushions. Very comfortable for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, looks to be made real well. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Danny Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks even better than in the pictures and is super comfortable. It also has a 180 degree swivel which was an unanticipated bonus

customer_reviews.title: Looked used
customer_reviews.text: It looked like it was already used and it didn t look safe . I was disappointed cuz i got it for my best friend birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Manuelle

customer_reviews.title: "Rocky"
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It feels nice. And rocks around softly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ♡
customer_reviews.text: Just the right product to chilax!! I love my hanging chair!! It is all I wanted and so beautiful.. ♡♡ Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cheers

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair, and it is sturdy and comfortable. I got it delivered in two different deliveries, but they came in fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t have asked for better!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this chair! Even when it’s cold outside I bundle up just to sit in it and drink my coffee. I HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone looking for a hanging chair.
customer_reviews.author: G Mills

customer_reviews.title: Product Dimensions listed are WRONG!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product expecting the base to be 37.5" in width as described. Unfortunately, that is incorrect. The base width is actually 43.5" and does not fit my deck.
customer_reviews.author: balatzu

customer_reviews.title: Relaxation
customer_reviews.text: I love it takes 2 people to put together is not a product for heavier persons cushions could use a little more stuffing but over all happy
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing swing
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It was fairly easy to put together. Comfy to sit on. Low enough that my 3 year old can climb into and swing in and he loves it too.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my Daughter on her birthday gift .but after 13 months top part broken and seller replaced that part which was broken, Again after some period of time It broke again from same ,top.and not because of too much weight . on average and normal weight 140lbs. i can add pics so customer who see before buy to this product .And its wickers also not durable

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy very comfortable and easy to put together and they give you extra screws and the cheapest price compared to other websites.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today me and my family are enjoying it the cushions are so comfortable! Will order another one 🙂

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The frame is cheaply made. Also, it is not very stable & has tipped over twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... chair hanging in my room and I couldn't be happier. It is beyond comfortable and pretty spacious
customer_reviews.text: I have this chair hanging in my room and I couldn't be happier. It is beyond comfortable and pretty spacious, I can sit in there for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie16

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer will not stand by product. Defective. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: The weld where the egg hooks broke as in many other pictures I have seen on Amazon. I went to the Christopher Knight Homes website and the company washes its hands of Amazon purchases. Disappointed with product and company.

customer_reviews.title: Rust bucket
customer_reviews.text: Already starting to rust where chair meets the chain. Not happy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this long time ago and still loving it!

customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. Will come back and review after she tries puts it together

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of this chair. It arrived earlier than expected, and was easy to assemble. Great quality and great price. The stand was included which is definitely a plus!!

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did not last one year ! Kept in doors. Bottom ripped apart! Used by no one over 130 pounds.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to put together and is very comfortable to sit in. It is a good quality product. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days! The shipping was amazingly fast, it was easy to set up and its gonna be perfect for my hippie room! It's very comfortable as well . Can't wait to nap in it someday Soon .

customer_reviews.title: 2 strings broke in just 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought the swing in october 2018 . In only 4 months 2 of the strings broke. The quality is not good.

customer_reviews.title: Sit back and relax
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chair. It's so comfortable. Everyone that comes over fights over the chair.

customer_reviews.text: This is an OWSAME product. It was meant to be as a gift for my daughter however she hardly ever has to chance to enjoy because my granddaughters bits her to it. Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Easily my favorite amazon purchase to date
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so easy to assemble that I did it by myself. It’s also so cozy and perfect for relaxing on my balcony.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible _

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for screened in porch. It's perfect. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Straps come loose
customer_reviews.text: 3 or 4 straps came loose on the second day. Ended up returning the chair and getting a different style.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my den
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and comfort of this chair. My grandkids love them as well.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. May get a couple more for the back deck.

customer_reviews.text: Three weeks after I placed my order received stand only chair is on back order cancelled order and requested refund

customer_reviews.title: Ding in base so won't go together-simple fix with the right tool.
customer_reviews.text: I have not taken the chair out of the box yet but the frame was fixed by a mechanic with a tool for tail pipes.

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Shipping was faster than expected, chair and stand are great quality and very sturdy. Directions were easy to understand. Chair is so comfortable, my boyfriend and I are enjoying it on our balcony. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, did not expect the cushion to be small, but overall it was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: but the chair feels sturdy and is made well
customer_reviews.text: This chair is big! I wanted to have it in my living room but moved it outside. It's big but gorgeous. Assembly took a bit, but the chair feels sturdy and is made well.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her birthday and she loves it!

customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I sit in it every morning on the deck with my coffee. Did I mention how comfortable it is?

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material, it doesn't appear to last long. Some of the wicker is already coming apart after putting it together. Looks better in the picture. Too $$ for what it is.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The assembling of the product took longer then expected but the outcome was great. We love the product.

customer_reviews.text: The chair is not as comfortable as I thought it would be

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home CKH Wicker Tear Drop Hanging Chair, Brown
product_meta.description: At Christopher Knight Home, we want to help you create the perfect backyard environment to make your outdoor space a gathering place for family & friends. Our outdoor brown wicker tear drop hanging chair can comfortably seat adults or kids in any outdoor location. The weather & uv-proof fabric & materials protect your chair from the elements & make this classic Pod chair a great pool-side seating option. Its sturdy build, durable materials, & Intricate design will offer years of sheer pleasure & make your outdoor space feel a little more like home. The wicker chair is 23. 5" D x 38" W x 48. 0" H, & the iron frame is 44. 0" D x 44. 0" W x 80" H. Some assembly required.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Christopher Knight Home Egg-shaped chair, with stand and cushion | 239197 model

This Christopher Knight Home hanging basket Swing Chair adds a fun lounge vibe to your Outdoor space | Constructed with durable black-brown faux wicker and a sturdy iron frame, it’s easy to care for and built to last
Our custom fitted Beige polyester seat cushions are made of a tough, yet soft, weatherproof fabric | The cushions are removable and washable
We created our comfortable tear-drop hanging chair with wicker and iron for a sleek modern look | Our mid-century modern egg chair looks great with other yard and patio sets, accessories, and decor
